headline: Jim Cramer Says Boring Is Good – NRG Energy (NRG) Is a Very Good Utility
summary: We recently published a list of 12 Stocks on Jim Cramer’s Radar Recently. In this article, we are going to take a look at where NRG Energy, Inc.
